body: Milda7 stories are all like this it’s not something new
It isn't....it's milda7.  EVERY story is like this.
Looks like a rewrite. A really bad rewrite, bad even for a rewrite. That's like 80´ s dub bad.

This is actually the worst hentai I have ever seen, the writing, the plot, the dialogue, the characters are all fucking terrible, the art is not bad per se, but it's just ugly as shit. This is what i would send people when they want to either kill a boner or when they ask for something that they would have trouble wanking off to.
Overall 0/10 abhorrent piece of shit.
I keep thinking I've seen the dumbest fucking thing on the site. I keep being wrong. Die, author.
